about: Experienced software engineer with 5+ years of experience in the industry. Proficient in Java, Spring, Angular, AWS, and DevOps technologies. Skilled in leading teams, designing, developing, and deploying robust software solutions to meet client and user needs. Experienced in RESTful API development, cloud-native application design, and containerization technologies. Aspiring to transition into a solution architect role to leverage technical expertise and strategic thinking in designing innovative solutions for complex business challenges.

skills.Dev/Ops tools: Git, Maven, Docker, K8s, Gitlab CI/GH Action, ...

edu.degree: ADSE - Advanced Diploma In Software Engineering

projects.name: RAG Chatbot
roleDes: Analyze requirements, make solution proposals
Design system architecture, featured LLDs
Develop the most important features base on requirements
Deploy the system and make guidelines
Review and assist other members
Support UAT issues
projects.des: A chatbot service base on LLM (Large Language Model) using RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) techniques for a CRM system.

projects.name: VTP CRM
roleDes: Participate in consulting on system architecture design and writing acceptance documents (HLD, Sizing Estimation, Deployment Plan, HA Testing, ...)
Develop gateway service functions (routing, authentication, authorization).
Support on architecture implementation (K8s, PostgreSQL, Redis, Kafka).
Support production operation issues.
projects.des: An internal CRM system of a delivery company.

projects.name: N99 MOESH
roleDes: Take part in the migration phase to migrate the old system to the new technologies stack.
Work on the service requests from the customer to deliver new features, enhancements, or resolve issues for the system.
Manage and coordinate service requests to team members, support and consult on task solutions.

projects.name: SRMS DATA STORAGE MVP
roleDes: Maintain features (manual and scheduled archiving process).
Build CI/CD pipeline, containerize application, deploy the application, operate servers.
projects.des: A system archives data from the agent systems which run on both on-premises and cloud to the central data warehouses.

projects.name: EVACCINE
roleDes: Take part in designing system architecture on the application layer.
Integrate EPay services (payment gateway, wallet, notifying, SMS) into application.
Deploy and support system operating.
projects.des: Vaccine injection management system especially support for Covid-19 vaccination campaigns.

projects.name: AIS MONITOR
roleDes: Design and build up system infrastructure.
Setup TCP/UDP listener for AIS IoT device.
Design and develop almost entire Back-end business services.
Work with Google API in-depth to optimize map performance.
projects.des: A system which monitors the ships's voyage in seaports and manages the dredgers plans.

projects.name: ECONTACT 2.0
roleDes: Develop module Chat group & ticket statistics dashboard.
Work with Websocket, Zalo API/Webhook, Kafka.
Deploy and monitor Java services on Linux VM.
projects.des: Internal application for telecom switchboard operators.
